title: A man travelled 6 miles towards the east and then turned right to travel 3 miles. Again he turned right to travel 4 miles. How far is he now from the starting point? - Quora

response.answer_text: Original question: “A man travelled 6 miles towards the east and then turned right to travel 3 miles. Again he turned right to travel 4 miles. How far is he now from the starting point?” Simple geometry question. (If done accurately, you will factor in the spherical radius of the planet.) Do your own homework, Mr. Anonymous.
